name: Olympicon
overview: Millions of people follow the Olympic Games on the screen of their TV sets, so we thought that the owners of 48K Spectrums should have the enjoyment of participating in the following five Olympic events: 1 100m dash 2 Long-jump 3 100m hurdles 4 Javelin throwing 5 High-jump In "Olympicon",, Ed Moses, brother of the legendary fighter Ken Moses Jnr., is holding all Olympic records: this is the challenge - can you beat him?
